Detailed Description

Super class of all XBee requests (TX packets).

Member Function Documentation

void XBeeRequest::assemblePacket (  ) 

This is called by the XBee class in XBee.send().

Users should never need to call this directly

void XBeeRequest::setFrameId ( uint8_t  frameId  ) 

Sets the frame id.

Must be between 1 and 255 inclusive to get a TX status response.

void XBeeRequest::setPacket ( uint8_t *  frameDataPtr  ) 

Provides the array to contain the packet.

Called by the XBee class. Users should never need to call this.
